channel.title: CVE Feed for WP EasyCart -- Shopping Cart & eCommerce Store
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WP EasyCart -- Shopping Cart & eCommerce Store

item.title: CVE-2021-34645|2024-09-17T03:23:00.942Z -- wp%20easycart -- shopping%20cart%20%26%20ecommerce%20store
item.description: The Shopping Cart & eCommerce Store WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery via the save_currency_settings function found in the ~/admin/inc/wp_easycart_admin_initial_setup.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 5.1.0.
